text:
Everything You Want To Know About Priyanka-Nick's Wedding And More From Ent.
Everything You Want To Know About Priyanka-Nick's Wedding And More From Ent.
For the uninitiated, the couple will tie the knot at Jodhpur’s Umaid Bhawan Palace. It’s going to be a royal affair for sure. The first pictures of the decked up Umaid Bhawan Palace are out, and it looks no less than a dream. Take a look!
When she visited the sets of reality TV show Sa Re Ga Ma Pa 2018, she got a rather unique gift – a doll of her brother Taimur Ali Khan. That’s creepy, don’t you think?
Don't Miss 365 SHARES 161 SHARES 862 SHARES
The paps managed to click them all. The most fascinating visual delight was to see Sophie Turner AKA Sansa Stark get all dolled up as a Desi Girl.
Now, the movie has beaten SS Rajamouli’s magnum opus Baahubali. Badhaai Ho is successfully running in the theatres six weeks after its release, and the six week’s collection of the Neena Gupta starrer film is reportedly more than that of Baahubali 2: The Conclusion.
In a detailed interview with Filmfare, Ranveer bared his heart out on marriage with Padukone and how he aims to be a millennial husband. In a first, Ranveer revealed that he was just waiting for his lady-love Deepika to give a final nod.
title: Everything You Want To Know About Priyanka-Nick's Wedding And More From Ent.

When she visited the sets of reality TV show Sa Re Ga Ma Pa 2018, she got a rather unique gift – a doll of her brother Taimur Ali Khan.
